title: Shawn Layden Leaves PlayStation - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.01.19
description:
Imran and Greg try to figure out what led to Shawn Layden's abrupt departure from Sony. 

Time Stamps - 
00:03:22 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:04:57 - Shawn Layden Leaves
00:06:24 - “With the weird handling of the news that Shawn Layden will be leaving PlayStation?” - Ignacio Rojas
00:25:40 - Gearbox/SAG Respond to Troy
00:29:42 - “I just wanted to provide my perspective (having worked in theatres with Actors Equity contracts)” - Trevor Starkey
00:39:28 - PlayStation Now cuts price in half
00:42:12 - “Do you think this is closer to Sony testing the waters for a more Game Pass like approach to first parties on Plus and Now?” - Ryan T
00:49:34 -  Quip
00:50:47 - Third Love
00:51:48 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:56:09 - “Do you think people are too quick to forgive mistakes or bad choices that companies make?” - Riot Goes Woof
01:01:51 - Squad Up: Chris Waterman - Twitch - RentalRush
01:03:08 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & O’Dell Harmond Jr.
